content: Hi! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, and I can help you schedule an appointment today. May I have your name, please?
Thank you, Mark. Could you please provide your address so we can confirm service availability?
Thanks, Mark. Can you please tell me more about the plumbing issue you’re experiencing so we can send the right technician?
The sink in my kitchen is leaking, and it’s getting worse.
I understand how frustrating that can be. We’ll get someone to help as soon as possible. What’s your ideal date and time for our plumber to visit?
Anytime after 6 is fine, I guess. Maybe tomorrow or... well, I work weird shifts, so like maybe next Monday but also maybe this weekend. I’m not really sure...

Thanks, Mark. Just to confirm, are you available after 6 PM tomorrow, this weekend, or next Monday? Could you please specify the exact date and time that would work best for you so I can check our schedule?
